name: Smut Dungeons: Snuggle Bundle
description:
The Smut Dungeons Snuggle Bundle is a collection of erotic fantasy text adventures containing interactive love-making scenes.
These interactive text sext adventures are for ADULTS ONLY (18+). Try not to rip your dick off.
The Adventures:
Desert Wind: The heat of the desert is wild and oppressive. As you venture through the sandy wastes, you come across an oasis. Stopping for a drink and a quick dip, you soon find that you're not alone... and you quickly find yourself in the hot embrace of a bronze-skinned god.
Naughty Nymphs: After a hard day of travel, you find yourself in a hidden grove surrounded by beautiful woodland nymphs. They have a request to make of you... will you fulfill their desires?
Palace of Pleasures: The Palace of Pleasures is a place where you can fulfill all of your desires. In a world ravaged by disease, the pristine palace is a place to go to escape reality for a while and enjoy the small (or big) things in life.
Pools of Wonder: After a stressful week at work, you have decided to take a little vacation. On the outskirts of the village lies a hidden grotto filled with magical, rejuvenating pools. You pack a few things and leave the village early in the morning, hoping to find peace and quiet for a while. What you find is more than you were expecting...
Samurai's Kiss: After a morning of sweaty exercise you decide to bathe in the river. I wonder if anyone will join you?
Play more Smut Dungeons here.
